abstract: The price of oil fell during the week while inflation in July rose to a 5.6 percent annual rate, a 17-year high. There was no clear direction for the stock market.

headline.main: Stocks Lack Direction Even as Oil Declines
headline.print_headline: Stocks Lack Direction Even as Oil Declines
